context: Hello! What kind of movies are you interested in?

resp: I would also suggest The Incredibles (2004) . You could get ready to see the new one that is coming out. I've never seen Into Thin Air: Death on Everest (1997) . It sounds interesting, though. I hope my suggestions helped?
